name: Chaos in the Saloon
description:
The Game

Chaos in the Saloon is a western bullet hell.

Objective

Survive as much as you can in between the gun fighting and the burning floor. Chaos.

Story

You are just serving the whisky one customer at a time, doing your job, and from nothing, someone flips a table in some corner of the saloon. Everyone freezes. That one second of silence... that omen of what is about to happen... the guns are out. Now the sound of the piano is getting stuffy with all the noise of gibber, shoots, glass, and screams. The place was turned into complete chaos. You can see the cheap wood floor start to burn, although not much because the floor is wet with blood. Glasses of whiskey and bullets are flying between the room. Probably you are going to die.
